about_the_game:
Attractorache - Soundtrack DLC is the original DLC, which mainly includes all the original parts of the game.





The contents include:


  • 6 exquisite checkpoint music

  • Lossless format and MP3 format

  • ISO image files that can be burned

Include music

  • Beautiful summer days

  • Space journey

  • Eternal star

  • The girl that hurts me

  • The journey of love

  • The wind of the October


Like Attractorache? Then you might as well buy an original voice.

name: Attractorache - Soundtrack DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Due Q6600 or AMD althon X4 630
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 7600GS or ATI X1600 Pro
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 4170 or AMD FX 6300
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX760 or ATI R7 260X
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
